h1_title: How to Unlock the Zodiac Village and Upgrade Armor
content: Crafting with Yin Tiger not only offers the usual ability to craft Weapons and Armor but also has the Upgrade Armor option, meaning you**can finally improve your armor in Black Myth: Wukong!**
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Zodiac_Village_and_Upgrade_Armor.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Zodiac Village and Upgrade Armor', specifically from the subsection 'How to Upgrade Armor'.
The content is as follows:
Crafting with Yin Tiger not only offers the usual ability to craft Weapons and Armor but also has the Upgrade Armor option, meaning you**can finally improve your armor in Black Myth: Wukong!**
